name: The Chessmaster
overview: Meet The Chessmaster. The strongest, most challenging chess program ever created for your Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The Chessmaster is a perfect teacher and a relentless foe. Beginners can learn from "Teach" and "Hint" modes, as well as the "Newcomer" levels of play. More experienced players can be challenged all the way up to the "Grandmaster" level!
